@juliascribbling Well, space opera isn't really about music. It's about interplanetary swordplay, traditional Joseph Campbell-type mythic questing, Arthurian legend transplanted into space w/galactic heroes & etherial princesses in distress & so on. And now I'll take my twitter hate from purists.
